      • all

 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Iterable<User>> all()

        Returns:
        will return all user with deleted status is 0

      • show

        @GetMapping(value="/users/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> show(@PathVariable
                                                                                                            java.lang.Long id)
        get detail by id
        Parameters:
        id - Long variable type this param is id of primary key user
        Returns:
        if success will return ResponseEntity object and it contain User object else will throwing the ResourceNotFoundException

 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> delete(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                        java.lang.Long id)
        action delete to set is deleted = 1
        Parameters:
        id - Long variable type this param is id of primary key user
        Returns:

      • getCurrentUser

        @GetMapping(value="/users/me")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserSummary> getCurrentUser(@CurrentUser
                                                                                                           UserPrincipal currentUser)
        get current user
        Parameters:
        currentUser - is using by system in backend process to find the current user, it identify by Header Bearer token that already signin
        Returns:
        UserSummary will return ResponseEntity contain UserSummary object

      • checkUserAvailability

        @GetMapping(value="/users/availability")
public UserIdentityAvailability checkUserAvailability(@RequestParam(value="key")
                                                                                                java.lang.String key,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="value")
                                                                                                java.lang.String value)
        check user availabilities by key and value available : username and email
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the user to be check. Cannot be empty
        value - Value of key to be check. Cannot be empty
        Returns:
        UserIdentityAvailability will return UserIdentityAvailability that contain user availability result
